shareContactDetails.intro: How wonderful! Both sides have approved the suggestion, which is always an exciting moment for us. It's time to take the next step and get to know each other. The contact details have also been sent to the other party.

onboardingPhotos.hook: In a world of words, a picture creates an instant human connection.
onboardingPhotos.mainMessage: We noticed your profile is still waiting for photos to bring it to life. This isn't about looks; it's about openness, seriousness, and trust. Profiles with at least 3 photos are taken more seriously by matchmakers and the other party, simply because they tell a more complete story. You are currently missing {{missingCount}} photos.

onboardingAiTeaser.hook: Great job completing the first stage! Our technology is not just for finding matches; it's for finding insights.
onboardingAiTeaser.mainMessage: Our AI is like another matchmaker on the team, working 24/7 to understand the nuances of your personality.

onboardingQuestionnaireWhy.subject: The secret to precise matches, {{firstName}}
onboardingQuestionnaireWhy.hook: We saw you started the questionnaire - excellent! We wanted to share the 'why' behind our methodology.
onboardingQuestionnaireWhy.mainMessage: Our questionnaire is built from 'Five Worlds' (Personality, Values, Relationship, Partner, and Religion) for a reason. This approach allows us (and the AI) to build a holistic picture of you, beyond dry data. It's the difference between a match based on 'what' and a match based on 'who'. Each answer you give is another thread woven into your personal narrative, allowing us to find someone whose story intertwines with yours.
onboardingQuestionnaireWhy.specificAction: Continue filling out the questionnaire and watch your profile come to life
onboardingQuestionnaireWhy.encouragement: You're not just filling out a form; you're building the map to finding your one.

onboardingValueAdd.subject: A tip from our matchmakers (and the AI) just for you, {{firstName}}
onboardingValueAdd.hook: Your profile is almost ready, and here are two powerful ways to take it to the next level.
onboardingValueAdd.mainMessage:
**1. The Power of a Testimonial:** Did you know? Profiles with at least one friend testimonial receive 40% more positive consideration. It signals credibility and builds trust instantly. Maybe it's time to request a short recommendation?

**2. A Personal Tip from the System:** Your 'About Me' section is your chance to tell a story.
onboardingValueAdd.aiTip: For example, our AI suggests enhancing your description by adding a concrete example of the value of "{{tip}}".
onboardingValueAdd.genericTip: For instance, try incorporating a short personal story that illustrates one of your prominent traits.
onboardingValueAdd.specificAction: Request a testimonial or upgrade your profile with your new tip
onboardingValueAdd.encouragement: These small details are what make the biggest difference.
